alert.note: Alert for Dubuque; Jackson; Jones (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 2:49PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jackson, southwestern Dubuque and northeastern Jones Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 248 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bernard, or 15 miles southwest of Dubuque, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could cause minor tree limb damage and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cascade, Epworth, La Motte, Bernard, Zwingle, Otter Creek, South Gary Owen, Garry Owen, Fillmore, Fillmore Recreation Area, Crab Town, Ironhills and Washington Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
